channel.title: Dragunov (With Scope)
channel.description:
Ok I thought i would put this with my other threat about Zombiescape Models but really I spent quite a lot of time on this model and was really impressed with how it turned out. It wasn't until about halfway through making the model that I was pretty sure it would work but yer in the end it worked out almost perfectly.
I have to thank Tate for the idea to make this model. Even though he requested it, I wouldn't have even attempted to make this model if not for him.
Now about half of this was traced(obviously the stock and the handel/grip thingy) whilst the rest was improvised. This is not a leech, I don't think anyone has even made a dragunov before, if you think i'm leeching or something check my zombie models thread I explain in there.
So enough with the boring explainations lets see some screenshots: (Click pictures to see full size) [URL=http://s98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/?action=view&current=Dragunov-1.jpg][IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/th_Dragunov-1.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://s98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/?action=view&current=Dragunov4.jpg][IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/th_Dragunov4.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://s98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/?action=view&current=Dragunov3.jpg][IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/th_Dragunov3.jpg[/img][/URL]
And here it is without a Scope:
[URL=http://s98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/?action=view&current=Dragunov2.jpg][IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/th_Dragunov2.jpg[/img][/URL]
Hope you enjoy, may release someday, just so everyone knows I will not release any of my Assult Riffles, Submachine guns or pistols, sorry but they are strickly for my server. Special weapons and rifles on the otherhand I will consider releasing since they are used less and harder to get(in game on my server) Oh and if your wondering Server is not out yet so don't ask "What Server".
Please leave Constructive Crtitcism, I don't care if you love or hate it, post criticism so I can make it better!

item.title: Dragunov (With Scope)
item.dc:creator: @wayzey wayzey
item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

BoneArmyProductions:

why didnt u just update the other topic?

Look at this model then look at my others. Notice how this one is a lil better then all them. I’ll update other thread now, main reason I posted it on new thread was just me taking pride in my work seeing this is by far the best model i’ve made so far.
